Verses: 1 pinbu Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Karththarudaiya Kattalaiyinbadiye Seenvanaandharaththilirundhu Purappattu, Pirayaanampanni, Revidheemile Vandhu Paalayamiranginaargal; Ange Janangalukkuk Kudikkath Thanneer Illaadhirundhadhu.

2 appozhudhu Janangal Moseyode Vaadhaadi: Naangal Kudikkiradharku Engalukkuth Thanneer Tharavendum Endraargal. Adharku Mose: Ennode En Vaadhaadugireergal, Karththarai En Pareetchai Paarkkireergal Endraan.

3 janangal Avvidaththile Thanneerth Thavanamaayirundhabadiyaal, Avargal Mosekku Virodhamaai Murumuruththu: Neer Engalaiyum Engal Pillaigalaiyum Engal Aadumaadugalaiyum Thanneerth Thavanaththinaal Kondrupoda Engalai Egipthilirundhu En Konduvandheer Endraargal.
4 mose Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittu: Indha Janangalukku Naan Enna Seyven, Ivargal Enmel Kalleriyap Paarkkiraargale Endraan.
5 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Isravel Moopparil Silarai Unnode Koottikkondu, Nee Nadhiyai Adiththa Un Kolai Un Kaiyile Pidiththukkondu, Janangalukku Munne Nadandhupo.

6 ange Orepile Naan Unakku Munbaagak Kanmalaiyinmel Nirpen; Nee Andhak Kanmalaiyai Adi; Appozhudhu Janangal Kudikka Adhilirundhu Thanneer Purappadum Endraar; Appadiye Mose Isravel Moopparin Kangalukku Munbaagach Seydhaan.

7 isravel Puththirar Vaadhaadinadhinimiththamum, Karththar Engal Naduvil Irukkiraaraa Illaiyaa Endru Avargal Karththaraip Pareetchai Paarththadhinimiththamum, Avan Andha Sthalaththirku Maasaa Endrum Meripaa Endrum Perittaan.

9 appozhudhu Mose Yosuvaavai Nokki: Nee Namakkaaga Manidharaith Therindhukondu, Purappattu, Amalekkode Yuththampannu; Naalaikku Naan Malaiyuchchiyil Dhevanudaiya Kolai En Kaiyil Pidiththukkondu Nirpen Endraan.
10 yosuvaa Thanakku Mose Sonnabadiye Seydhu, Amalekkode Yuththam Panninaan. Moseyum Aaronum Oor Enbavanum Malaiyuchchiyil Erinaargal.
11 mose Than Kaiyai Ereduththirukkaiyil, Isravelar Merkondaargal; Avan Than Kaiyaith Thaazhavidugaiyil, Amalekku Merkondaan.

12 moseyinkaigal Asarndhupoyitru, Appozhudhu Avargal Oru Kallaik Konduvandhu Avan Keezhe Vaiththaargal; Adhinmel Utkaarndhaan; Aaronum Oorum Oruvan Oru Pakkaththilum Oruvan Maru Pakkaththilum Irundhu, Avan Kaigalaith Thaanginaargal; Ivvidhamaai Avan Kaigal Sooriyan Asthamikkumvaraikkum Ore Nilaiyaayirundhadhu.
13  Yosuvaa Amalekkaiyum Avan Janangalaiyum Pattayakkarukkinaale Muriya Adiththaan.

14 pinbu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Idhai Ninaivukoorumporuttu, Nee Oru Pusthagaththil Ezhudhi, Yosuvaavin Sevi Ketkumbadi Vaasi. Amalekkai Vaanaththin Keezhengum Iraadhabadikku Naasam Pannuven Endraar.
15 mose Oru Balibedaththaik Katti, Adharku Yegovaanisi Endru Perittu,
16 amalekkin Kai Karththarudaiya Singaasanaththukku Virodhamaayirundhabadiyaal, Thalaimurai Thalaimuraidhorum Avanukku Virodhamaai Karththarin Yuththam Nadakkum Endraan.
